summary: I\'ve added a vampire nord follower named Ezio. You can find him in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This is my attempt at creating a follower. 
Equipment:
Ebony Armor of Extreme Health
Ebony Gauntlets of Extreme Marksman
Ebony boots of Extreme Stamina
Ebony Helmet of Major Destruction
Daedric Bow of Extreme Shock Damage
Daedric Arrows (100)

He is fully voiced with one of the default sounds already present in Skyrim.

Installation
1) Paste the .esp file in Skyrim/Data folder.
2) Open Skyrim Launcher.exe and check it.

Disclaimer: You may use this mod in your mod with my permission.
author: sKaR1488
